description: ff. 217. 271 x 185; 215 x 138 mm. 29 lin. 15th/16th cen. Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 310. The second vol., incompl. at end; begins with bāb infāq al-māl (kitāb al-zakāh) and breaks off in bāb ṣiyām ayyām al-tashrīq. Incip.: ... باب انفاق المال فى حقه حدثنا ىحىى بن اسمعىل ... عن ابن مسعود قال سمعت رسول الله ... ىقول لا حسد الا فى اثنتىن
author: Ibn Zaknūn, ʻAlī ibn al-ḥusayn, d. 1434
title: al-Kawākib al-darārī fī tartib Musnad al-Imām Aḥmad ʻalá abwāb al-Bukhārī.
creator: Ibn Zaknūn, ʻAlī ibn al-ḥusayn, d. 1434
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
